医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ChatGPT 能否彻底改变营养教育？研究探讨潜力和挑战ChatGPT 作为营养领域知识增强工具的应用潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Can-ChatGPT-revolutionize-nutrition-education-Study-examines-pottial-and-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Can-ChatGPT-revolutionize-nutrition-education-Study-examines-pottial-and-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b93ddd8e-329a-468f-b00a-7b117d9a7a83 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Can ChatGPT revolutionize nutrition education? Study examines potential and challenges
新的生物材料可以改变人体组织在实验室中生长的方式悉尼新南威尔士大学的科学家们创造了一种新材料，可以改变人体组织在实验室中生长和在医疗程序中使用的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-biomaterial-could-change-the-way- human-tissue-can-be-grown-in-the-lab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-biomaterial-could-change-the-way- human-tissue-can-be-grown-in-the-lab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e6e5b87-6bea-4489-b92f-4d603a904cb7 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 23:28:54 -0400 New biomaterial could change the way human tissue can be grown in the lab
新的软件工具提供了一种更安全的基因组编辑设计方法一组研究人员开发了一种名为 DANGER（通过 RNA 测序评估的有害和可预期指南）分析的软件工具，该工具为所有具有转录组的生物体中更安全的基因组编辑设计提供了一种方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-software-tool-provides-a-way-for-safer-design-of-genome-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-software-tool-provides-a-way-for-safer-design-of-genome-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=848b1f50-69f8-418d-8261-15cec53a060e Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:56:37 -0400 New software tool provides a way for safer design of genome editing
研究显示，四岁的孩子在无聊时会多吃 79% 的卡路里阿斯顿大学进行的一项新研究表明，四岁的孩子在无聊时比心情平和时多摄入 79% 的卡路里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Children-as-young-as-four-years-old-eat-7925-more-calories-when-bored-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Children-as-young-as-four-years-old-eat-7925-more-calories-when-bored-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341b6292-b87d-469e-9bcb-76e63d699c72 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:52:23 -0400 Children as young as four years old eat 79% more calories when bored, study shows
研究人员开发用于自动结直肠癌组织分析的人工智能工具于韦斯屈莱大学的研究人员与图尔库大学生物医学研究所和芬兰中部诺瓦大学合作开发了一种用于自动结直肠癌组织分析的人工智能工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-develop-artificial-intelligence-tool-for-automatic-colorectal-cancer-tissue-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-develop-artificial-intelligence-tool-for-automatic-colorectal-cancer-tissue-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2794048f-0cda-4646-8f49-1adc2a0d09d6 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:46:12 -0400 Researchers develop artificial intelligence tool for automatic colorectal cancer tissue analysis
疫情：没有大米，疫苗有什么用？环境历史学家伊夫泰哈·伊克巴尔 (Iftekhar Iqbal) 表示，20 世纪 70 年代是“孟加拉国整个历史”中死亡人数最多的十年https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Epidemic-What-good-is-a-vaccine-when-there-is-no-rice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Epidemic-What-good-is-a-vaccine-when-there-is-no-rice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbe10355-a313-4793-8a37-e302c01b40b6 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:38:09 -0400 Epidemic: What good is a vaccine when there is no rice?
BA.2.86 Omicron 亚变体表现出高受体亲和力，但具有中等中和抗性研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron BA.2.86 变体的受体亲和力和抗原性，结果表明，与其他最新变体相比，它对人类血清中和的抵抗力并不高。尽管其突变数量和受体亲和力较高，但该变体对中和作用的敏感性比 EG.5.1 变体稍高，因此需要持续监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/BA286-Omicron-sub-variant-shows-high-receptor-affinity-but-moderate-neutralization-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/BA286-Omicron-sub-variant-shows-high-receptor-affinity-but-moderate-neutralization-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=436d354b-baa7-4a32-a073-e35ea5ee4443 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:36:00 -0400 BA.2.86 Omicron sub-variant shows high receptor affinity but moderate neutralization resistance
您的康普茶和开菲尔中到底含有什么？研究人员深入研究了 47 种不同发酵食品的细菌多样性，揭示了微生物丰富度和组成的显着差异。该研究强调，康普茶和开菲尔等食品具有很高的微生物多样性，而植物性酸奶替代品和发酵蔬菜的微生物多样性较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Whats-really-in-your-kombucha-and-kefir.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Whats-really-in-your-kombucha-and-kefir.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a36183e8-602c-49e3-bdf8-1cc4a207eebc Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:20:00 -0400 What's really in your kombucha and kefir?
患有 Omicron 的儿童三天后不具有传染性，疫苗接种状态无关研究发现，无论是否接种疫苗，儿童中 SARS-CoV-2 的 Omicron 变种的中位感染持续时间为三天。研究结果表明，当前的 5 天隔离政策得到了支持，但返校指南中无需考虑疫苗接种或加强状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Kids-with-Omicron-non-infectious-after-third-days-vaccination-status-irrelevant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Kids-with-Omicron-non-infectious-after-third-days-vaccination-status-irrelevant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87a60a39-67b1-4911-b5de-e2c93430065f Tue, 24 Oct 2023 21:42:00 -0400 Kids with Omicron non-infectious after three days, vaccination status irrelevant
社区免疫：引导 SARS-CoV-2 的进化进程德国研究人员开发了一种综合适应度模型，通过整合遗传、流行病学和免疫学数据来预测 SARS-CoV-2 的进化。该研究强调了群体免疫在形成病毒突变中的作用，并为新变种的出现提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Community-immunity-Steering-the-evolutionary-course-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Community-immunity-Steering-the-evolutionary-course-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e470493f-6361-42af-baae-83a2926ceb84 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 21:10:00 -0400 Community immunity: Steering the evolutionary course of SARS-CoV-2
